00011 template <class MatType>
00012 class SVDCompleteIncrementalLearning
00013 {
00014  public:
00015   SVDCompleteIncrementalLearning(double u = 0.0001,
00016                                  double kw = 0,
00017                                  double kh = 0)
00018             : u(u), kw(kw), kh(kh)
00019     {}
00020 
00021   void Initialize(const MatType& dataset, const size_t rank)
00022   {
00023     (void)rank;
00024     n = dataset.n_rows;
00025     m = dataset.n_cols;
00026 
00027     currentUserIndex = 0;
00028     currentItemIndex = 0;
00029   }
00030 
00047   inline void WUpdate(const MatType& V,
00048                       arma::mat& W,
00049                       const arma::mat& H)
00050   {
00051     arma::mat deltaW(1, W.n_cols);
00052     deltaW.zeros();
00053     while(true)
00054     {
00055       double val;
00056       if((val = V(currentItemIndex, currentUserIndex)) != 0)
00057       {
00058         deltaW += (val - arma::dot(W.row(currentItemIndex), H.col(currentUserIndex))) 
00059                                         * arma::trans(H.col(currentUserIndex));
00060         if(kw != 0) deltaW -= kw * W.row(currentItemIndex);
00061         break;
00062       }
00063       currentUserIndex = currentUserIndex + 1;
00064       if(currentUserIndex == n)
00065       {
00066         currentUserIndex = 0;
00067         currentItemIndex = (currentItemIndex + 1) % m;
00068       }
00069     }
00070 
00071     W.row(currentItemIndex) += u*deltaW;
00072   }
00073 
00083   inline void HUpdate(const MatType& V,
00084                       const arma::mat& W,
00085                       arma::mat& H)
00086   {
00087     arma::mat deltaH(H.n_rows, 1);
00088     deltaH.zeros();
00089 
00090     while(true)
00091     {
00092       double val;
00093       if((val = V(currentItemIndex, currentUserIndex)) != 0)
00094       deltaH += (val - arma::dot(W.row(currentItemIndex), H.col(currentUserIndex))) 
00095                                       * arma::trans(W.row(currentItemIndex));
00096       if(kh != 0) deltaH -= kh * H.col(currentUserIndex);
00097 
00098       currentUserIndex = currentUserIndex + 1;
00099       if(currentUserIndex == n)
00100       {
00101         currentUserIndex = 0;
00102         currentItemIndex = (currentItemIndex + 1) % m;
00103       }
00104     }
00105 
00106     H.col(currentUserIndex++) += u * deltaH;
00107   }
00108 
00109  private:
00110   double u;
00111   double kw;
00112   double kh;
00113 
00114   size_t n;
00115   size_t m;
00116 
00117   size_t currentUserIndex;
00118   size_t currentItemIndex;
00119 };

00136   void Initialize(const arma::sp_mat& dataset, const size_t rank)
00137   {
00138     (void)rank;
00139     n = dataset.n_rows;
00140     m = dataset.n_cols;
00141 
00142     it = new arma::sp_mat::const_iterator(dataset.begin());
00143     isStart = true;
00144   }

00155   inline void WUpdate(const arma::sp_mat& V,
00156                       arma::mat& W,
00157                       const arma::mat& H)
00158   {
00159     if(!isStart) (*it)++;
00160     else isStart = false;
00161 
00162     if(*it == V.end())
00163     {
00164         delete it;
00165         it = new arma::sp_mat::const_iterator(V.begin());
00166     }
00167 
00168     size_t currentUserIndex = it->col();
00169     size_t currentItemIndex = it->row();
00170 
00171     arma::mat deltaW(1, W.n_cols);
00172     deltaW.zeros();
00173 
00174     deltaW += (**it - arma::dot(W.row(currentItemIndex), H.col(currentUserIndex))) 
00175                                       * arma::trans(H.col(currentUserIndex));
00176     if(kw != 0) deltaW -= kw * W.row(currentItemIndex);
00177 
00178     W.row(currentItemIndex) += u*deltaW;
00179   }
00180 
00190   inline void HUpdate(const arma::sp_mat& V,
00191                       const arma::mat& W,
00192                       arma::mat& H)
00193   {
00194     (void)V;
00195   
00196     arma::mat deltaH(H.n_rows, 1);
00197     deltaH.zeros();
00198 
00199     size_t currentUserIndex = it->col();
00200     size_t currentItemIndex = it->row();
00201 
00202     deltaH += (**it - arma::dot(W.row(currentItemIndex), H.col(currentUserIndex))) 
00203                                         * arma::trans(W.row(currentItemIndex));
00204     if(kh != 0) deltaH -= kh * H.col(currentUserIndex);
00205 
00206     H.col(currentUserIndex++) += u * deltaH;
00207   }

00211   double kw;
